<h2><span id=".E5.A4.96.E9.83.A8.E9.93.BE.E6.8E.A5"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="外部链接">外部链接</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E9%A9%AC%E6%9D%A5%E8%A5%BF%E4%BA%9A&amp;action=edit&amp;section=41" title="编辑章节：外部链接">编辑</a><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<table class="mbox-small plainlinks sistersitebox" style="border:1px solid #aaa;background-color:#f9f9f9;font-size:small;">
<tbody><tr>
<td class="mbox-image"><img alt="" class="noviewer" data-file-height="1376" data-file-width="1024" decoding="async" height="40" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/4/4a/Commons-logo.svg/30px-Commons-logo.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/4/4a/Commons-logo.svg/45px-Commons-logo.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/4/4a/Commons-logo.svg/59px-Commons-logo.svg.png 2x" width="30"/></td>
<td class="mbox-text plainlist"><a href="/wiki/%E7%BB%B4%E5%9F%BA%E5%85%B1%E4%BA%AB%E8%B5%84%E6%BA%90" title="维基共享资源">维基共享资源</a>中相关的多媒体资源：<b><a class="external text" href="https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Malaysia?uselang=zh">马来西亚</a></b>（<a class="external text" href="https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Category:Malaysia?uselang=zh">分类</a>）</td></tr></tbody></table>
<table class="mbox-small plainlinks sistersitebox" style="border:1px solid #aaa;background-color:#f9f9f9;font-size:small;">
<tbody><tr>
<td class="mbox-image"><img alt="" class="noviewer" data-file-height="350" data-file-width="370" decoding="async" height="38" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/e/ec/Wiktionary-logo.svg/40px-Wiktionary-logo.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/e/ec/Wiktionary-logo.svg/60px-Wiktionary-logo.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/e/ec/Wiktionary-logo.svg/80px-Wiktionary-logo.svg.png 2x" width="40"/></td>
<td class="mbox-text plainlist">查看<a href="/wiki/%E7%BB%B4%E5%9F%BA%E8%AF%8D%E5%85%B8" title="维基词典">维基词典</a>中的词条「<b><a class="extiw" href="https://zh.wiktionary.org/wiki/%E9%A9%AC%E6%9D%A5%E8%A5%BF%E4%BA%9A" title="wikt:马来西亚">马来西亚</a></b>」。</td></tr></tbody></table>
<dl><dt><a href="/wiki/%E9%A9%AC%E6%9D%A5%E8%A5%BF%E4%BA%9A%E6%94%BF%E5%BA%9C" title="马来西亚政府">马来西亚政府</a></dt></dl>
<ul><li><span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英文）</span><a class="external text" href="http://www.statistics.gov.my" rel="nofollow">马来西亚统计局</a>（<a class="external text" href="//web.archive.org/web/20080611041219/http://www.statistics.gov.my/" rel="nofollow">页面存档备份</a>，存于<a href="/wiki/%E4%BA%92%E8%81%94%E7%BD%91%E6%A1%A3%E6%A1%88%E9%A6%86" title="互联网档案馆">互联网档案馆</a>）</li>
<li><span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英文）</span><a class="external text" href="http://www.malaysia.gov.my/" rel="nofollow">myGovernment Portal</a> （<a class="external text" href="//web.archive.org/web/20201218120721/http://www.malaysia.gov.my/" rel="nofollow">页面存档备份</a>，存于<a href="/wiki/%E4%BA%92%E8%81%94%E7%BD%91%E6%A1%A3%E6%A1%88%E9%A6%86" title="互联网档案馆">互联网档案馆</a>） - 马来西亚政府网上入口</li>
<li><span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英文）</span><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20080512085506/http://www.bernama.com.my/" rel="nofollow">Bernama</a> - 马来西亚国家新闻机构</li>
<li><span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英文）</span><a class="external text" href="http://www.tourism.gov.my/" rel="nofollow">Tourism Malaysia</a> （<a class="external text" href="//web.archive.org/web/20210203085121/http://www.tourism.gov.my/" rel="nofollow">页面存档备份</a>，存于<a href="/wiki/%E4%BA%92%E8%81%94%E7%BD%91%E6%A1%A3%E6%A1%88%E9%A6%86" title="互联网档案馆">互联网档案馆</a>） - 马来西亚旅游局入口</li>
<li><span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英文）</span><a class="external text" href="http://www.virtualmalaysia.com/" rel="nofollow">Virtual Malaysia</a> （<a class="external text" href="//web.archive.org/web/20100324115230/http://www.virtualmalaysia.com/" rel="nofollow">页面存档备份</a>，存于<a href="/wiki/%E4%BA%92%E8%81%94%E7%BD%91%E6%A1%A3%E6%A1%88%E9%A6%86" title="互联网档案馆">互联网档案馆</a>） - 马来西亚官方观光局入口</li>
<li><span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英文）</span><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20160204223127/http://www.pmo.gov.my/" rel="nofollow">马来西亚首相署</a></li>
<li><span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英文）</span><a class="external text" href="http://www.rtm.gov.my/" rel="nofollow">Radio Televisyen Malaysia</a> （<a class="external text" href="//web.archive.org/web/20100808131333/http://www.rtm.gov.my/" rel="nofollow">页面存档备份</a>，存于<a href="/wiki/%E4%BA%92%E8%81%94%E7%BD%91%E6%A1%A3%E6%A1%88%E9%A6%86" title="互联网档案馆">互联网档案馆</a>） - 国营电视网路</li>
<li><span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英文）</span><a class="external text" href="http://www.matrade.gov.my/" rel="nofollow">马来西亚外部贸易发展参事处</a> （<a class="external text" href="//web.archive.org/web/20200617085111/http://www.matrade.gov.my/" rel="nofollow">页面存档备份</a>，存于<a href="/wiki/%E4%BA%92%E8%81%94%E7%BD%91%E6%A1%A3%E6%A1%88%E9%A6%86" title="互联网档案馆">互联网档案馆</a>）</li>
<li><span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英文）</span><a class="external text" href="http://www.smidec.gov.my/" rel="nofollow">中小企业发展法人参事处</a> （<a class="external text" href="//web.archive.org/web/20201125084637/http://www.smidec.gov.my/" rel="nofollow">页面存档备份</a>，存于<a href="/wiki/%E4%BA%92%E8%81%94%E7%BD%91%E6%A1%A3%E6%A1%88%E9%A6%86" title="互联网档案馆">互联网档案馆</a>）</li></ul>

<li><img alt="" data-file-height="256" data-file-width="256" decoding="async" height="16" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b0/Openstreetmap_logo.svg/16px-Openstreetmap_logo.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b0/Openstreetmap_logo.svg/24px-Openstreetmap_logo.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b0/Openstreetmap_logo.svg/32px-Openstreetmap_logo.svg.png 2x" width="16"/> <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/OpenStreetMap" title="OpenStreetMap">OpenStreetMap</a>上有关<a class="external text" href="https://www.openstreetmap.org/relation/2108121" rel="nofollow">马来西亚</a>的地理信息</li>
<li>于<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/WikiMapia" title="WikiMapia">WikiMapia</a>的 <a class="external text" href="http://www.wikimapia.org/#lat=1.933227&amp;lon=107.270508&amp;z=5&amp;l=0&amp;m=a" rel="nofollow">马来西亚卫星空照图</a>（<a class="external text" href="//web.archive.org/web/20181225091439/http://www.wikimapia.org/#lat=1.933227&amp;lon=107.270508&amp;z=5&amp;l=0&amp;m=a" rel="nofollow">页面存档备份</a>，存于<a href="/wiki/%E4%BA%92%E8%81%94%E7%BD%91%E6%A1%A3%E6%A1%88%E9%A6%86" title="互联网档案馆">互联网档案馆</a>）</li></ul>
<dl><dt>概观与资料</dt></dl>
<ul><li><a href="/wiki/%E5%A4%A7%E8%8B%B1%E7%99%BE%E7%A7%91%E5%85%A8%E4%B9%A6" title="大英百科全书">大英百科全书</a>里的 <a class="external text" href="https://www.britannica.com/place/Malaysia" rel="nofollow">马来西亚</a> （<a class="external text" href="//web.archive.org/web/20210126081846/https://www.britannica.com/place/Malaysia" rel="nofollow">页面存档备份</a>，存于<a href="/wiki/%E4%BA%92%E8%81%94%E7%BD%91%E6%A1%A3%E6%A1%88%E9%A6%86" title="互联网档案馆">互联网档案馆</a>）</li>
<li><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E4%B8%96%E7%95%8C%E6%A6%82%E6%B3%81" title="世界概况">世界各国纪实年鉴</a>里的 <a class="external text" href="https://www.cia.gov/library/publications/the-world-factbook/geos/my.html" rel="nofollow">马来西亚</a>（<a class="external text" href="//web.archive.org/web/20101228233159/https://www.cia.gov/library/publications/the-world-factbook/geos/my.html" rel="nofollow">页面存档备份</a>，存于<a href="/wiki/%E4%BA%92%E8%81%94%E7%BD%91%E6%A1%A3%E6%A1%88%E9%A6%86" title="互联网档案馆">互联网档案馆</a>）</li></ul>

<li><span style="font-family: sans-serif; cursor: default; color:#54595d; font-size: 0.8em; bottom: 0.1em; font-weight: bold;" title="连接到英语网页">（英文）</span><a class="external text" href="http://www.talkmalaysia.com/" rel="nofollow">Malaysia Guide</a> （<a class="external text" href="//web.archive.org/web/20210125103608/http://www.talkmalaysia.com/" rel="nofollow">页面存档备份</a>，存于<a href="/wiki/%E4%BA%92%E8%81%94%E7%BD%91%E6%A1%A3%E6%A1%88%E9%A6%86" title="互联网档案馆">互联网档案馆</a>）</li>

<li>英国军事管制区
<ul><li><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Pentadbiran Tentera British (Tanah Melayu)" data-lang-code="ms" data-lang-name="马来语" data-orig-title="英国军事管制区 (马来亚)"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E8%8B%B1%E5%9B%BD%E5%86%9B%E4%BA%8B%E7%AE%A1%E5%88%B6%E5%8C%BA_(%E9%A9%AC%E6%9D%A5%E4%BA%9A)&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="英国军事管制区 (马来亚)（页面不存在）">马来亚</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">马来语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://ms.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pentadbiran_Tentera_British_(Tanah_Melayu)" title="ms:Pentadbiran Tentera British (Tanah Melayu)"><span dir="auto" lang="ms">Pentadbiran Tentera British (Tanah Melayu)</span></a></span>）</span></span></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%E8%8B%B1%E5%9C%8B%E8%BB%8D%E4%BA%8B%E7%AE%A1%E5%88%B6%E5%8D%80_(%E5%A9%86%E7%BE%85%E6%B4%B2)" title="英国军事管制区 (婆罗洲)">婆罗洲</a></li></ul></li>
<li><a href="/wiki/%E8%8B%B1%E5%B1%AC%E9%A6%AC%E4%BE%86%E4%BA%9E" title="英属马来亚">英属马来亚</a>

<li><a href="/wiki/%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%89%E5%A4%A7%E9%A9%AC%E8%BF%9C%E6%99%AF%E7%AD%96%E5%88%92%E7%BA%B2%E8%A6%81" title="第三大马远景策划纲要">OPP3<small>(2001-2010年)</small></a> <small>-<span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="National Development Policy" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="国家宏愿政策"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E5%9B%BD%E5%AE%B6%E5%AE%8F%E6%84%BF%E6%94%BF%E7%AD%96&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="国家宏愿政策（页面不存在）">国家宏愿政策</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/National_Development_Policy" title="en:National Development Policy"><span dir="auto" lang="en">National Development Policy</span></a></span>）</span></span></small></li>
<li><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="New Economic Model" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="新经济模式"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" <p><b>深蓝色:</b> 主要人口以英语为母语的国家及地区。<br/>
</p><p><b>浅蓝色</b>: 英语有官方语言地位的国家及地区。英语同时是<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E6%AD%90%E7%9B%9F" title="欧盟">欧盟</a>的官方语言。 
</p>

<ul><li><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/%E8%8B%B1%E5%B1%9E%E5%8D%B0%E5%BA%A6" title="英属印度"><img alt="英属印度" class="notpageimage thumbborder" data-file-height="300" data-file-width="600" decoding="async" height="11" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/be/British_Raj_Red_Ensign.svg/22px-British_Raj_Red_Ensign.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/be/British_Raj_Red_Ensign.svg/33px-British_Raj_Red_Ensign.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/be/British_Raj_Red_Ensign.svg/44px-British_Raj_Red_Ensign.svg.png 2x" width="22"/></a></span> <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E8%8B%B1%E5%B1%AC%E5%8D%B0%E5%BA%A6" title="英属印度">英属印度</a>
<ul><li>1858-1911：<a href="/wiki/%E8%A5%BF%E5%A7%86%E6%8B%89" title="西姆拉">西姆拉</a>、<a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E5%8A%A0%E7%88%BE%E5%90%84%E7%AD%94" title="加尔各答">加尔各答</a>；1911-1947：<a href="/wiki/%E8%A5%BF%E5%A7%86%E6%8B%89" title="西姆拉">西姆拉</a>、<a href="/wiki/%E5%BE%B7%E9%87%8C" title="德里">德里</a></li></ul></li>

<li><span class="flagicon"><img alt="" class="notpageimage thumbborder" data-file-height="800" data-file-width="1600" decoding="async" height="11" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/51/Flag_of_North_Korea.svg/22px-Flag_of_North_Korea.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/51/Flag_of_North_Korea.svg/33px-Flag_of_North_Korea.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/51/Flag_of_North_Korea.svg/44px-Flag_of_North_Korea.svg.png 2x" width="22"/> </span><a href="/wiki/%E6%9C%9D%E9%B2%9C%E6%B0%91%E4%B8%BB%E4%B8%BB%E4%B9%89%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E5%85%B1%E5%92%8C%E5%9B%BD" title="朝鲜民主主义人民共和国">朝鲜民主主义人民共和国</a>
<ul><li>1948-1972：<a href="/wiki/%E5%B9%B3%E5%A3%A4%E5%B8%82" title="平壤市">平壤</a>、<a href="/wiki/%E9%A6%96%E7%88%BE%E7%89%B9%E5%88%A5%E5%B8%82" title="首尔特别市">首尔</a></li></ul></li>
<li><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/%E8%8F%B2%E5%BE%8B%E5%AE%BE" title="菲律宾"><img alt="菲律宾" class="notpageimage thumbborder" data-file-height="600" data-file-width="1200" decoding="async" height="11" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/99/Flag_of_the_Philippines.svg/22px-Flag_of_the_Philippines.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/99/Flag_of_the_Philippines.svg/33px-Flag_of_the_Philippines.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/99/Flag_of_the_Philippines.svg/44px-Flag_of_the_Philippines.svg.png 2x" width="22"/></a></span> <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/%E8%8F%B2%E5%BE%8B%E8%B3%93" title="菲律宾">菲律宾</a>

<li><span class="flagicon"><img alt="" class="notpageimage thumbborder" data-file-height="600" data-file-width="900" decoding="async" height="15" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/72/Flag_of_the_Republic_of_China.svg/22px-Flag_of_the_Republic_of_China.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/72/Flag_of_the_Republic_of_China.svg/33px-Flag_of_the_Republic_of_China.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/72/Flag_of_the_Republic_of_China.svg/44px-Flag_of_the_Republic_of_China.svg.png 2x" width="22"/> </span><a href="/wiki/%E4%B8%AD%E8%8F%AF%E6%B0%91%E5%9C%8B" title="中华民国">中华民国</a>
<ul><li>1937-1945：<a href="/wiki/%E5%8D%97%E4%BA%AC%E5%B8%82_(%E4%B8%AD%E8%8F%AF%E6%B0%91%E5%9C%8B)" title="南京市 (中华民国)">南京</a>、<a href="/wiki/%E9%87%8D%E6%85%B6%E5%B8%82_(%E4%B8%AD%E8%8F%AF%E6%B0%91%E5%9C%8B)" title="重庆市 (中华民国)">重庆</a>；1949-1991：<a href="/wiki/%E5%8D%97%E4%BA%AC%E5%B8%82_(%E4%B8%AD%E8%8F%AF%E6%B0%91%E5%9C%8B)" title="南京市 (中华民国)">南京</a>、<a href="/wiki/%E8%87%BA%E5%8C%97%E5%B8%82" title="台北市">台北</a></li></ul></li></ul>

<ul><li><small>1. 香港最初是以「<a href="/wiki/%E9%A6%99%E6%B8%AF" title="香港">香港</a>（Hong Kong）」名义加入，直至1997年7月1日<a href="/wiki/%E9%A6%99%E6%B8%AF%E5%9B%9E%E6%AD%B8" title="香港回归">香港主权移交</a>后改用「中国香港（Hong Kong, China）」<br/>2. <a href="/wiki/%E4%B8%AD%E8%8F%AF%E6%B0%91%E5%9C%8B" title="中华民国">中华民国</a>以「<a href="/wiki/%E4%B8%AD%E8%8F%AF%E8%87%BA%E5%8C%97" title="中华台北">中华台北</a>（Chinese Taipei）」名义加入</small></li></ul>

<li><span class="flagicon"><a href="/wiki/%E7%A7%91%E7%A7%91%E6%96%AF%EF%BC%88%E5%9F%BA%E6%9E%97%EF%BC%89%E7%BE%A4%E5%B3%B6" title="科科斯（基林）群岛"><img alt="科科斯（基林）群岛" class="notpageimage thumbborder" data-file-height="300" data-file-width="600" decoding="async" height="11" src="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/74/Flag_of_the_Cocos_%28Keeling%29_Islands.svg/22px-Flag_of_the_Cocos_%28Keeling%29_Islands.svg.png" srcset="//upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/74/Flag_of_the_Cocos_%28Keeling%29_Islands.svg/33px-Flag_of_the_Cocos_%28Keeling%29_Islands.svg.png 1.5x, //upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/7/74/Flag_of_the_Cocos_%28Keeling%29_Islands.svg/44px-Flag_of_the_Cocos_%28Keeling%29_Islands.svg.png 2x" width="22"/></a></span> <a href="/wiki/%E7%A7%91%E7%A7%91%E6%96%AF%EF%BC%88%E5%9F%BA%E6%9E%97%EF%BC%89%E7%BE%A4%E5%B3%B6" title="科科斯（基林）群岛">科科斯（基林）群岛</a></li>

</div></td></tr></tbody></table></td></tr></tbody></table>

<ul><li><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Parliamentary Union of the OIC Member States" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="伊斯兰会议组织成员国议会联盟"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E4%BC%8A%E6%96%AF%E5%85%B0%E4%BC%9A%E8%AE%AE%E7%BB%84%E7%BB%87%E6%88%90%E5%91%98%E5%9B%BD%E8%AE%AE%E4%BC%9A%E8%81%94%E7%9B%9F&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="伊斯兰会议组织成员国议会联盟（页面不存在）">伊斯兰会议组织成员国议会联盟（PUOICM）</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Parliamentary_Union_of_the_OIC_Member_States" title="en:Parliamentary Union of the OIC Member States"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Parliamentary Union of the OIC Member States</span></a></span>）</span></span>  <span class="nowrap"><span class="ilh-all" data-foreign-title="Islamic Conference Youth Forum for Dialogue and Cooperation" data-lang-code="en" data-lang-name="英语" data-orig-title="伊斯兰会议对话与合作青年论坛"><span class="ilh-page"><a class="new" href="/w/index.php?title=%E4%BC%8A%E6%96%AF%E8%98%AD%E6%9C%83%E8%AD%B0%E5%B0%8D%E8%A9%B1%E8%88%87%E5%90%88%E4%BD%9C%E9%9D%92%E5%B9%B4%E8%AB%96%E5%A3%87&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" title="伊斯兰会议对话与合作青年论坛（页面不存在）">伊斯兰会议对话与合作青年论坛（ICYFDC）</a></span><span class="noprint ilh-comment">（<span class="ilh-lang">英语</span><span class="ilh-colon">：</span><span class="ilh-link"><a class="extiw" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Islamic_Conference_Youth_Forum_for_Dialogue_and_Cooperation" title="en:Islamic Conference Youth Forum for Dialogue and Cooperation"><span dir="auto" lang="en">Islamic Conference Youth Forum for Dialogue and Cooperation</span></a></span>）</span></span></span></li></ul>

<nav aria-labelledby="p-tb-label" class="vector-menu mw-portlet mw-portlet-tb vector-menu-portal portal" id="p-tb" role="navigation">
<h3 class="vector-menu-heading" id="p-tb-label">
<span class="vector-menu-heading-label">工具</span>
</h3>
<div class="vector-menu-content">
<ul class="vector-menu-content-list"><li class="mw-list-item" id="t-whatlinkshere"><a accesskey="j" href="/wiki/Special:%E9%93%BE%E5%85%A5%E9%A1%B5%E9%9D%A2/%E9%A9%AC%E6%9D%A5%E8%A5%BF%E4%BA%9A" title="列出所有与本页相链的页面[j]"><span>链入页面</span></a></li><li class="mw-list-item" id="t-recentchangeslinked"><a accesskey="k" href="/wiki/Special:%E9%93%BE%E5%87%BA%E6%9B%B4%E6%94%B9/%E9%A9%AC%E6%9D%A5%E8%A5%BF%E4%BA%9A" rel="nofollow" title="页面链出所有页面的更改[k]"><span>相关更改</span></a></li><li class="mw-list-item" id="t-upload"><a accesskey="u" href="/wiki/Project:%E4%B8%8A%E4%BC%A0" title="上传图像或多媒体文件[u]"><span>上传文件</span></a></li><li class="mw-list-item" id="t-specialpages"><a accesskey="q" href="/wiki/Special:%E7%89%B9%E6%AE%8A%E9%A1%B5%E9%9D%A2" title="全部特殊页面的列表[q]"><span>特殊页面</span></a></li><li class="mw-list-item" id="t-permalink"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E9%A9%AC%E6%9D%A5%E8%A5%BF%E4%BA%9A&amp;oldid=73952017" title="此页面该修订版本的固定链接"><span>固定链接</span></a></li><li class="mw-list-item" id="t-info"><a href="/w/index.php?title=%E9%A9%AC%E6%9D%A5%E8%A5%BF%E4%BA%9A&amp;action=info" title="关于此页面的更多信息"><span>页面信息</span></a></li><li class="mw-list-item" id="t-cite"><a href="/w/index.php?title=Special:%E5%BC%95%E7%94%A8%E6%AD%A4%E9%A1%B5%E9%9D%A2&amp;page=%E9%A9%AC%E6%9D%A5%E8%A5%BF%E4%BA%9A&amp;id=73952017&amp;wpFormIdentifier=titleform" title="关于如何引用本页的信息"><span>引用本页</span></a></li><li class="mw-list-item" id="t-wikibase"><a accesskey="g" href="https://www.wikidata.org/wiki/Special:EntityPage/Q833" title="链接到连接的数据仓库项目[g]"><span>维基数据项目</span></a></li></ul>
